title: card.version Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing firmware version information and device details.

api.description: The current Notecard API major version in use.

body.description: An object containing Notecard firmware details for programmatic access.

org.description: Organization name set for the Notecard.

product.description: Product name set for the Notecard.

ver_major.description: Major version of the Notecard firmware.

ver_minor.description: Minor version of the Notecard firmware.

ver_patch.description: Patch version of the Notecard firmware.

ver_build.description: Build version of the Notecard firmware.

built.description: Date and time the Notecard firmware was built.

cell.description: If `true`, indicates the Notecard supports cellular connectivity.

gps.description: If `true`, indicates the Notecard has an onboard GPS module.

name.description: The official name of the device.

version.description: The full version number of the Notecard firmware.

wifi.description: If `true`, indicates the Notecard supports Wi-Fi connectivity.

samples.title: Complete Version Response
samples.description: Example response showing comprehensive version and device information.

samples.title: Minimal Version Response
samples.description: Example response with only the required version field.

samples.title: WiFi Notecard Version
samples.description: Example response for a WiFi-enabled Notecard.
